weatherAdaptiveWateringScheduler.description: Adjusts watering schedules based on current and forecasted weather conditions to conserve water and optimize plant health.

weatherAdaptiveFertilizingScheduler.description: Schedules fertilization events by analyzing weather patterns to maximize nutrient uptake and reduce runoff.

userInterface.description: User-friendly dashboard for monitoring garden status, receiving notifications, and manually adjusting schedules.

aiIntegration.description: Leverages AI to learn from user input and environmental data to continuously optimize gardening practices.

goals: Enhance user engagement with smart gardening tools
